name: ORDER_DISP_COMMENT
description: This table contains dispense comments for orders.

columns.name: ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The order ID for this medication order.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date in internal, decimal format.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.
